title: Linen Inventory Check
description: The head of housekeeping needs to check the current inventory levels for clean towels.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs into the system.

tasks.description: Query the system for the current stock count of 'Bath Towel - Clean'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system reports 500 clean bath towels are in stock.

tasks.description: Compare the current stock to the par level and determine if a new laundry order is needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The par level is 800, so the agent determines a new batch needs to be laundered.
